//: meant as a companion to the Survivor's Flintlock Sniper.
description: A paper cartridge containing black powder and a Minie ball.  A paper enclosed version of the historic projectile of the USA Civil war.  The Minie ball is still as deadly and accurate as ever.
A light, flammable gas compressed for use as fuel.  Quite energy dense, but also requiring a lot of energy to produce, even moreso without pre-cataclysm industry.
A thin-walled capsule formed of strange resin filled with a strange liquid, used by exotic autoinjector mechanisms.
